page.title: 15LOCAL GOVERNMENT
page.content: The Provost enjoys visiting Youth Groups, Organisations and Receptions and goes everywhere he is asked as he regards this as an honour. He has only been Provost for 2-3 months and already has ambitions for Clydebank's Centenary Year in 1986. He hopes that Queen Elizabeth II and her husband, Prince Philip, will visit Clydebank and sail in the Britannia to Rothesay Docks since the Britannia was built in Clydebank. Provost Grainger spends approximately 50 hours each week working as Provost and has the use of the Provost's Chain which is worth about Â£16000.
